properties.name: position
properties.description: Sidenav bar rendering position. example position='relative','right'

properties.name: data-reader
properties.description: Key in JSON datasource for records

properties.name: display-key
properties.description: Display Key provides the user defined key to parent json Array (parent key name can be changed)

properties.name: child-array-key
properties.description: Child Array Key provides the user defined key to children json object (children key name can be changed)

propertiesitem.name: display-key
propertiesitem.description: Display Key provides the user defined key to parent json Array (parent key name can be changed)

propertiesitem.name: data
propertiesitem.description: We can pass local data to side nav node(child) components.

propertiesitem.name: label
propertiesitem.description: Providing user define Label to sidenav node.

propertiesitem.name: icon
propertiesitem.description: Providing user define Icon to sidenav node.

propertiesitem.name: badge
propertiesitem.description: Providing user define Badge to sidenav node.

propertiesitem.name: enable-border
propertiesitem.description: enable border to the side nav component.

events.name: nodeClick
events.description: Fire when sidenav bar menu click
